title: Type Cast: Font Preview Widget for Tiger
content:
I just found [this type widget](http://web.archive.org/web/20050518131152/http:/www.apple.com/downloads/macosx/dashboard/typecast.html) on Apple’s widgets download area. I’ve used it a little bit, and it’s quite nice. It responds quickly and gives you a nice area to check out your type as you want to, check out the basic character set, and go to the font file itself, which is nice.

Here’s an example of the typing preview (notice the lack of kerning) and an example of the character set preview:
